Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the earnings limitation for employment of certain retired persons as school bus drivers
Summary: Removes the earnings limitation for employment of certain retired persons as school bus drivers until the end of 2022.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to removing the earnings limitation for employment of certain retired persons as school bus drivers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
